column5: I am headed up to the Cabonga on Friday with overnight in Mont Laurier. My favorite shop for Crawlers and Leaches in L'Announciation (or Saint Veronique) will likely be closed so I figure I need to hit somewhere before that. Any recommendations?

I don't know of one before L'Announciantion but there is one in Lac-des-Ecorces - 8 km before Mont Laurier. If your staying overnight in Mont Laurier, it's a quick drive back to the bait shop in the morning...depending how early you plan on leaving. I would check the hours the bait shop is open the night before.

Thanks, found the shop in L'annonciation stays open until 9 PM and it's called Les Coureur Des Bois. Incredible what you can find on the interwebs these days. I was able to find the store front on Google Map's Street View:http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&sour...278.44,,0,7.31
